name: Finire
description:
Thank you for checking out my game! Can you beat the clock? Finire is  a story-driven drift.racing game created for Trijam 201.  Controls: W - Accelerate S - Brake D- Steer Right A - Steer Left KNOWN ERRORS: TO RESTART AFTER YOU LOSE PRESS TAB TO NAVIGATE AND ENTER TO SUBMIT, GAME WILL NOT END WHEN YOU RUN OUT OF TIME Total time taken was 3 hours and a couple of minutes to resolve some last second errors that were found during packaging. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Art, programming - Antonio Finelli [Doublefs] Music, Story - NCFAUDIO [NCFAUDIO Store]
